unnormalised: Bharati lok Diwali kedna manaytat? Mhaka dista, Diwali, uzvaddacho utsav, hachi Gregorian tarikh nischit nashta. Ti Hindu chandrache calendaracher adharit asa, khas karun Kartik mhoinyacher. Tech khatir Diwali Octoberchea nimanne vattekant ani Novemberchea modhent kednai yetat. Hea vorsak, 2024, te October 31ver yetolemh dison yeta.
normalised: Bharati lok Diwali kednaa sortaat? Barobar, Diwali, uzvaddaacho utsav, hachi tharavik Gregorian tarik nashta. Ti Hindu chandrachea calendaracher aadharit asta, khas korun Kartik mhoineaant. Techakaraan Diwali October-chea xevottak ani November-chea modhe-meren kednaai poddunk xakta. Hea varsa, don hozaar ani chovis, ti October ektees-ak poddum yetta.

unnormalised: Utsov sadharanponnank 5 dis choltat, Dhanteraschea sangata suru zatat, mukhel Diwali disache adim 2 dis. Magir Naraka Chaturdashi (Choti Diwali) adle disa asta. Diwali, jea disa Lakshmi Puja kortat, sadharanponnank amavasyechea ratri asta. Nimannek, Govardhan Puja ani Bhai Dooj utsav sompoytat. Mhunnun tumcheo sukhechea disanchem yojon 29/10/24 thaun 02/11/24 poriant korat!
normalised: Utsav samanyata paanch dis choltat, Dhanteras-an suru zaun, mukhel Diwali disa adlea don disa. Magir Naraka Chaturdashi (Choti Diwali) adlea disa asta. Diwali-cho mukhel dis, jea vellar Lakshmi Puja kortat, samanyata nove chandraache ratek poddta, va Amavasya. Xevttak, Govardhan Puja ani Bhai Dooj utsav sompovpak asta. Mhunnun tumcheo suttyo October unttis don hozaar ani chovis thaun November dusrea don hozaar ani chovis meren aayojit karaat!

unnormalised: Her mhotvache utsovui bhovtat. Udharonnak, Holi, rangacho utsav, March mhoinyant monoitat, punn thik tarikh vorsa voros bodlota. Ti sadharanponnank Phalgun mhoinyant purnimechea dusrea disa asta. Tech porim, Eid-ul-Fitr ani Eid-ul-Adha Islamic chandrache calendarak fattlavn kortat, mhunnun tancheo Gregorian tariko dar vorsak bodlotat. He chandrache calendar samajop khup mhotvachem asa thik tariko zanno gheunk.
normalised: Dusre mukhel utsavui phirtaa. Udahoronnak, Holi, rongaancho utsav, March-ant sorta, punn tharavik tarik vorsak vorsak bodlota. Ti samanyata Phalgun mhoineaant purnimaa (punve) adlea disa poddta. Tech porim, Eid-ul-Fitr ani Eid-ul-Adha Islamic chandrachea calendarak fattlavtat, mhunnun tancheo Gregorian tarikho dor varsa bodlotaat. Hea chandrachea calendarachi vollokh asop tharavik tarikho sambhallunk zaruri.

unnormalised: Diwali sarkhea utsovanchi thik tarikh sodunk, Hindu calendar check korop vo vishwas thevo jevpa ud'dhogachem online zannkar, drikpanchang.com sarkhem, tankaim ek bori idea asa. Chodd patram vorosache survek mhotvache tariko chapun haddtat. Mhunnun 2024 ani fuddlak utsovank suki yojanavoll korat!
normalised: Diwali sarkhea utsavank tharavik tarikho sodunk, Hindu calendar polleop va drikpanchang.com sarkhea visvasachea online sadhnaanchi vollokh gheop ek bori yukti. Zaitea vortomanpotrani vorsachea suruvatich mahatvacheo tarikanchi suchi chapta. Mhunnun don hozaar ani chovis ani fuddarak utsavanchi khuuxi-bhara yojna karaat!
